original_title: The Damning of a Country Merchant
overview: The life of the patriarch of a rural merchant family in 1910 Indiana is suddenly disrupted by a charismatic industrialist who has engaged in a secret affair with his wife. When rising tensions mistakenly lead to a customer's death, his wounded authority and manhood leave him vulnerable to truly bizarre and horrifying forces causing unimaginable chaos and terror.
title: The Damning of a Country Merchant
